languages.text: "Иногда нам всем приходится считаться с обстоятельствами, когда любой — любой — союзник на вес золота..." {n}Абеляр, кажется, пытается убедить самого себя — он смотрит на ксеноса со смесью тревоги и негодования.{/n}
"Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Иногда нам всем приходится считаться с обстоятельствами, когда любой — любой — союзник на вес золота..." {n}Абеляр, кажется, пытается убедить самого себя — он смотрит на ксеноса со смесью тревоги и негодования.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally worth their weight in gold..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos with indignation and dismay.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Faute de mieux, il faut parfois savoir s'accommoder des alliés à notre disposition, » {n}tente de se persuader Abélard en observant le xénos d'un air dégoûté et désespéré.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Faute de mieux, il faut parfois savoir s'accommoder des alliés à notre disposition, » {n}tente de se persuader Abélard en observant le xénos d'un air dégoûté et désespéré.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “有时候我们根本没有挑选的余地……情况过于危险，无论……无论是什么样的盟友，都需要争取过来……”{n}阿贝拉德努力说服自己。他盯着眼前的异形，脸上挂着愤怒与沮丧的神情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “有时候我们根本没有挑选的余地……情况过于危险，无论……无论是什么样的盟友，都需要争取过来……”{n}阿贝拉德努力说服自己。他盯着眼前的异形，脸上挂着愤怒与沮丧的神情。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「時には、大切な味方を失ってでも戦わねばならない状況が…あるのです…」{n}アベラルドは自分を納得させようと、憤りと落胆の表情で異種族を見つめてている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「時には、大切な味方を失ってでも戦わねばならない状況が…あるのです…」{n}アベラルドは自分を納得させようと、憤りと落胆の表情でゼノを見つめてている。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Manchmal werden wir mit Umständen konfrontiert, bei denen jeder ... Verbündete zählt ..." {n}Abelard versucht sich selbst zu überzeugen und blickt den Xenos entrüstet und bestürzt an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Manchmal werden wir mit Umständen konfrontiert, bei denen jeder ... Verbündete zählt ..." {n}Abelard versucht sich selbst zu überzeugen und blickt den Xenos entrüstet und bestürzt an.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «A veces todos tenemos que afrontar situaciones en las que cualquier... aliado es bienvenido...». {n}Abelard trata de convencerse a sí mismo mientras observa al xenos con una mezcla de indignación y consternación.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «A veces todos tenemos que afrontar situaciones en las que cualquier... aliado es bienvenido...». {n}Abelard trata de convencerse a sí mismo mientras observa al xenos con una mezcla de indignación y consternación.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bazen... Her... Her müttefikin önem arz ettiği koşulları kabullenmemiz gerekir..." {n}Abelard, kendini ikna etmeye çalışıyor. Zenoya bakışlarından öfke ve keder akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Sometimes we all have to contend with circumstances that make any... any ally count..." {n}Abelard is trying to convince himself, looking at the xenos in indignation and dismay.{/n}
